title: Mortality and morbidity table certifications
personalDataVerified: Actuary name, certifying body (Society of Actuaries, AAA), table version, population basis, effective date
personalDataVisible: Link to actuarial standards body system (actuaries and regulators, public access)
rationale: Prevents fake mortality tables undermining all insurance pricing. Domain binding verifies actuarial standards body (Society of Actuaries, American Academy of Actuaries). Permanent industry standards used for decades across entire insurance industry. Critical for insurance pricing where mortality assumptions determine premiums and reserves. Public actuarial standards.
